GK19kmeghvpu:0: kaś cit kāntāvirahaguruṇā svādhikārapramattaḥ śāpenāstaṅgamitamahimā varṣabhogyeṇa bhartuḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:1: yakṣaś cakre janakatanayāsnānapuṇyodakeṣu snigdhacchāyātaruṣu vasatiṃ rāmagiryāśrameṣu // KMdV_1 //
GK19kmeghvpu:2: tasminn adrau kati cid abalāviprayuktaḥ sa kāmī nītvā māsān kanakavalayabhraṃśariktaprakoṣṭhaḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:3: āṣāḍhasya praśamadivase megham āśliṣṭasānuṃ vaprakrīḍāpariṇatagajaprekṣaṇīyaṃ dadarśa // KMdV_2
GK19kmeghvpu:4: tasya sthitvā katham api puraḥ ketakādhānahetor antarbāṣpaś ciram anucaro rājarājasya dadhyau
GK19kmeghvpu:5_0: meghāloke bhavati sukhino 'py anyathāvṛtti cetaḥ kaṇṭhāśleṣapraṇayini jane kiṃ punar
GK19kmeghvpu:5_1: dūrasaṃsthe pratyāsanne nabhasi dayitājīvitālambanārthī jīmūtena svakuśalamayīṃ hārayiṣyan
GK19kmeghvpu:6_0: sa pratyagraiḥ kuṭajakusumaiḥ kalpitārghāya tasmai prītaḥ prītipramukhavacanaṃ svāgataṃ
GK19kmeghvpu:6_1: vyājahāra dhūmajyotiḥsalilamarutāṃ saṃnipātaḥ kva meghaḥ saṃdeśārthāḥ kva paṭukaraṇaiḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:7: ity autsukyād aparigaṇayan guhyakas taṃ yayāce kāmārtā hi praṇayakṛpaṇāś cetanācetaneṣu // KMdV_5 //
GK19kmeghvpu:8: jātaṃ vaṃśe bhuvanavidite puṣkarāvartakānāṃ jānāmi tvāṃ prakṛtipuruṣaṃ kāmarūpaṃ maghonaḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:9: tenārthitvaṃ tvayi vidhivaśād dūrabandhur gato 'haṃ yācñā vandhyā varam
GK19kmeghvpu:11: saṃtaptānāṃ tvam asi śaraṇaṃ tat payoda priyāyāḥ saṃdeśaṃ me hara dhanapatikrodhaviśleṣitasya
GK19kmeghvpu:12_0: gantavyā te vasatir alakā nāma yakṣeśvarāṇāṃ bāhyodyānasthitaharaśiraścandrikādhautaharmyā
GK19kmeghvpu:12_1: tvām ārūḍhaṃ pavanapadavīm udgṛhītālakāntāḥ prekṣiṣyante pathikavanitāḥ pratyayād
GK19kmeghvpu:13_0: kaḥ saṃnaddhe virahavidhurāṃ tvayy upekṣeta jāyāṃ na syād anyo 'py aham iva jano
GK19kmeghvpu:13_1: yaḥ parādhīnavṛttiḥ āpṛcchasva priyasakham amuṃ tuṅgam āliṅgya śailaṃ vandyaiḥ puṃsāṃ
GK19kmeghvpu:14_0: kāle kāle bhavati bhavatā yasya saṃyogam etya snehavyaktiś ciravirahajaṃ muñcato

GK19kmeghvpu:15_1: balākāḥ tāṃ cāvaśyaṃ divasagaṇanātatparām ekapatnīm avyāpannām avihatagatir drakṣyasi
GK19kmeghvpu:16_0: āśābandhaḥ kusumasadṛśaṃ prāyaśo hy aṅganānāṃ sadyaḥpātapraṇayi hṛdayaṃ viprayoge

GK19kmeghvpu:20_0: sthānād asmāt sarasaniculād utpatodaṅmukhaḥ khaṃ diṅnāgānāṃ pathi pariharan sthūlahastāvalehān

GK19kmeghvpu:24: channopāntaḥ pariṇataphaladyotibhiḥ kānanāmrais tvayy ārūḍhe śikharam acalaḥ snigdhaveṇīsavarṇe

GK19kmeghvpu:37: vidyuddāmasphuritacakitais tatra paurāṅganānāṃ lolāpāṅgair yadi na ramase locanair vañcito 'si // KMdV_27 //
GK19kmeghvpu:39: nirvindhyāyāḥ pathi bhava rasābhyantaraḥ saṃnipatya strīṇām ādyaṃ praṇayavacanaṃ vibhramo hi priyeṣu // KMdV_28 //
GK19kmeghvpu:40: veṇībhūtapratanusalilāṃ tām atītasya sindhuṃ pāṇḍucchāyāṃ taṭaruhatarubhraṃśibhir jīrṇaparṇaiḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:41_0: saubhāgyaṃ te subhaga virahāvasthayā vyañjayantīṃ kārśyaṃ yena tyajati vidhinā sa

GK19kmeghvpu:43: dīrghīkurvan paṭu madakalaṃ kūjitaṃ sārasānāṃ pratyūṣeṣu sphuṭitakamalāmodamaitrīkaṣāyaḥ /

GK19kmeghvpu:66: tasmād gaccher anukanakhalaṃ śailarājāvatīrṇāṃ jahnoḥ kanyāṃ sagaratanayasvargasopānapaṅktim

GK19kmeghvpu:67_1: tasyāḥ pātuṃ suragaja iva vyomni pūrvārdhalambī tvaṃ ced acchasphaṭikaviśadaṃ tarkayes
GK19kmeghvpu:68_0: saṃsarpantyā sapadi bhavataḥ srotasi cchāyayā sā syād asthānopanatayamunāsaṃgam evābhirāmā
GK19kmeghvpu:68_1: āsīnānāṃ surabhitaśilaṃ nābhigandhair mṛgāṇāṃ tasyā eva prabhavam acalaṃ prāpya gauraṃ
GK19kmeghvpu:69_0: vakṣyasy adhvaśramavinayane tasya śṛṅge niṣaṇṇaḥ śobhāṃ ramyāṃ trinayanavṛṣotkhātapaṅkopameyām
GK19kmeghvpu:69_1: taṃ ced vāyau sarati saralaskandhasaṃghaṭṭajanmā bādhetolkākṣapitacamarīvālabhāro
GK19kmeghvpu:70_0: arhasy enaṃ śamayitum alaṃ vāridhārāsahasrair āpannārtipraśamanaphalāḥ saṃpado hy
GK19kmeghvpu:70_1: uttamānām ye tvāṃ muktadhvanim asahanāḥ kāyabhaṅgāya tasmin darpotsekād upari śarabhā
GK19kmeghvpu:71_0: tān kurvīthās tumulakarakāvṛṣṭihāsāvakīrṇān ke vā na syuḥ paribhavapadaṃ niṣphalārambhayatnāḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:71_1: tatra vyaktaṃ dṛṣadi caraṇanyāsam ardhendumauleḥ śaśvat siddhair upahṛtabaliṃ bhaktinamraḥ

GK19kmeghvpu:75_0: nirhrādī te muraja iva cet kandarāsu dhvaniḥ syāt saṃgītārtho nanu paśupates tatra
GK19kmeghvpu:75_1: bhāvī samastaḥ prāleyādrer upataṭam atikramya tāṃs tān viśeṣān haṃsadvāraṃ bhṛgupatiyaśovartma
GK19kmeghvpu:76_0: tenodīcīṃ diśam abhisares tiryagāyāmaśobhī śyāmaḥ pādo baliniyamanābhyudyatasyeva
GK19kmeghvpu:76_1: viṣṇoḥ // gatvā cordhvaṃ daśamukhabhujocchvāsitaprasthasaṃdheḥ kailāsasya tridaśavanitādarpaṇasyātithiḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:77_0: śṛṅgocchrāyaiḥ kumudaviśadair yo vitatya sthitaḥ khaṃ rāśībhūtaḥ pratiniśam iva tryambakasyāṭṭahāsaḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:78_0: līlām adreḥ stimitanayanaprekṣaṇīyāṃ bhavitrīm aṃsanyaste sati halabhṛto mecake vāsasīva //
GK19kmeghvpu:78_1: hitvā nīlaṃ bhujagavalayaṃ śambhunā dattahastā krīḍāśaile yadi ca viharet pādacāreṇa

GK19kmeghvpu:79_1: ārohaṇeṣu tatrāvaśyaṃ janitasalilodgāram antaḥpraveśān neṣyanti tvāṃ surayuvatayo

GK19kmeghvpu:81: hemāmbhojaprasavi salilaṃ mānasasyādadānaḥ kurvan kāmāt kṣaṇamukhapaṭaprītim airāvaṇasya /
GK19kmeghvpu:82: dhunvan vātaiḥ sajalapṛṣataiḥ kalpavṛkṣāṃśukāni cchāyābhinnaḥ sphaṭikaviśadaṃ nirviśeḥ paravataṃ tam // KMdV_62 //
GK19kmeghvpu:83: tasyotsaṅge praṇayina iva srastagaṅgādugūlāṃ na tvaṃ dṛṣṭvā na punar alakāṃ jñāsyase kāmacārin
GK19kmeghvpu:84_0: yā vaḥ kāle vahati salilodgāram uccairvimānā muktājālagrathitam alakaṃ kāminīvābhravṛndam
GK19kmeghvpu:84_1: vidyutvantaṃ lalitavanitāḥ sendracāpaṃ sacitrāḥ saṃgītāya prahatamurajāḥ snigdhagambhīraghoṣam
GK19kmeghvpu:85: antastoyaṃ maṇimayabhuvas tuṅgam abhraṃlihāgrāḥ prāsādās tvāṃ tulayitum alaṃ yatra tais tair viśeṣaiḥ // KMdV_64 //
GK19kmeghvpu:86: haste līlākamalam alakaṃ bālakundānuviddhaṃ nītā rodhraprasavarajasā pāṇḍutām ānanaśrīḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:87_0: cūḍāpāśe navakuravakaṃ cāru karṇe śirīṣaṃ sīmante ca tvadupagamajaṃ yatra nīpaṃ vadhūnām //
GK19kmeghvpu:87_1: yasyāṃ yakṣāḥ sitamaṇimayāny etya harmyasthalāni jyotiśchāyākusumaracanāny uttamastrīsahāyāḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:88_0: āsevante madhu ratiphalaṃ kalpavṛkṣaprasūtaṃ tvadgambhīradhvaniṣu śanakaiḥ puṣkareṣv
GK19kmeghvpu:88_1: āhateṣu yatra strīṇāṃ priyatamabhujāliṅganocchvāsitānām aṅgaglāniṃ suratajanitāṃ
GK19kmeghvpu:89_1: candrakāntāḥ netrā nītāḥ satatagatinā yad vimānāgrabhūmīr ālekhyānāṃ navajalakaṇair
GK19kmeghvpu:90_0: śaṅkāspṛṣṭā iva jalamucas tvādṛśā yatra jālair dhūmodgārānukṛtinipuṇaṃ jarjarā niṣpatanti
GK19kmeghvpu:90_1: nīvībandhocchvasanaśithilaṃ yatra yakṣāṅganānāṃ vāsaḥ kāmād anibhṛtakareṣv ākṣipatsu
GK19kmeghvpu:91_0: arcistuṅgān abhimukham api prāpya ratnapradīpān hrīmūḍhānāṃ bhavati viphalapreraṇaś
GK19kmeghvpu:91_1: cūrṇamuṣṭiḥ gatyutkampād alakapatitair yatra mandārapuṣpaiḥ kḷptacchedyaiḥ kanakakamalaiḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:92_0: muktālagnastanaparimalaiś chinnasūtraiś ca hārair naiśo mārgaḥ savitur udaye sūcyate
GK19kmeghvpu:92_1: kāminīnām matvā devaṃ dhanapatisakhaṃ yatra sākṣād vasantaṃ prāyaś cāpaṃ na vahati
GK19kmeghvpu:93: sabhrūbhaṅgaprahitanayanaiḥ kāmilakṣyeṣv amoghais tasyārambhaś caturavanitāvibhramair eva siddhaḥ // KMdV_71 //
GK19kmeghvpu:94: tatrāgāraṃ dhanapatigṛhān uttareṇāsmadīyaṃ dūrāl lakṣyaṃ tad amaradhanuś cāruṇā toraṇena /
GK19kmeghvpu:95_0: yasyopānte kṛtakatanayaḥ kāntayā vardhito me hastaprāpyastavakanamito bālamandāravṛkṣaḥ //
GK19kmeghvpu:95_1: vāpī cāsmin marakataśilābaddhasopānamārgā haimaiḥ syūtā kamalamukulaiḥ snigdhavaiḍūryanālaiḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:96: yasyās toye kṛtavasatayo mānasaṃ saṃnikṛṣṭaṃ na dhyāsyanti vyapagataśucas tvām api prekṣya haṃsāḥ // KMdV_73 //
GK19kmeghvpu:97: yasyās tīre nicitaśikharaḥ peśalair indranīlaiḥ krīḍāśailaḥ kanakakadalīveṣṭanaprekṣaṇīyaḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:98_0: madgehinyāḥ priya iti sakhe cetasā kātareṇa prekṣyopāntasphuritataḍitaṃ tvāṃ tam
GK19kmeghvpu:98_1: eva smarāmi raktāśokaś calakisalayaḥ kesaraś cātra kāntaḥ pratyāsannau kuravakavṛter
GK19kmeghvpu:99_0: ekaḥ sakhyās tava saha mayā vāmapādābhilāṣī kāṅkṣaty anyo vadanamadirāṃ dohadacchadmanāsyāḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:99_1: tanmadhye ca sphaṭikaphalakā kāñcanī vāsayaṣṭir mūle naddhā maṇibhir anatiprauḍhavaṃśaprakāśaiḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:100: tālaiḥ śiñjadvalayasubhagair nartitaḥ kāntayā me yām adhyāste divasavigame nīlakaṇṭhaḥ suhṛd vaḥ // KMdV_76 //
GK19kmeghvpu:101: ebhiḥ sādho hṛdayanihitair lakṣaṇair lakṣaṇīyaṃ dvāropānte likhitavapuṣau śaṅkhapadmau ca dṛṣṭvā /
GK19kmeghvpu:102_0: kṣāmacchāyaṃ bhavanam adhunā madviyogena nūnaṃ sūryāpāye na khalu kamalaṃ puṣyati
GK19kmeghvpu:102_1: svām abhikhyām gatvā sadyaḥ kalabhatanutāṃ śīghrasaṃpātahetoḥ krīḍāśaile prathamakathite
GK19kmeghvpu:103_0: arhasy antarbhavanapatitāṃ kartum alpālpabhāsaṃ khadyotālīvilasitanibhāṃ vidyudunmeṣadṛṣṭim
GK19kmeghvpu:103_1: tanvī śyāmā śikharadaśanā pakvabimbādharauṣṭhī madhye kṣāmā cakitahariṇaprekṣaṇī
GK19kmeghvpu:104_0: śroṇībhārād alasagamanā stokanamrā stanābhyāṃ yā tatra syād yuvativiṣaye sṛṣṭir ādyeva
GK19kmeghvpu:104_1: dhātuḥ tāṃ jānīyāḥ parimitakathāṃ jīvitaṃ me dvitīyaṃ dūrībhūte mayi sahacare cakravākīm
GK19kmeghvpu:105_0: gāḍhotkaṇṭhāguruṣu divaseṣv eṣu gacchatsu bālāṃ jātāṃ manye śiśiramathitāṃ padminīṃ
GK19kmeghvpu:105_1: vānyarūpām nūnaṃ tasyāḥ prabalaruditocchūnanetraṃ bahūnāṃ niḥśvāsānām aśiśiratayā
GK19kmeghvpu:106_0: hastanyastaṃ mukham asakalavyakti lambālakatvād indor dainyaṃ tvadupasaraṇakliṣṭakānter
GK19kmeghvpu:106_1: bibharti āloke te nipatati purā sā balivyākulā vā matsādṛśyaṃ virahatanu vā bhāvagamyaṃ
GK19kmeghvpu:107: pṛcchantī vā madhuravacanāṃ śārikāṃ pañjarasthāṃ kac cid bhartuḥ smarasi nibhṛte tvaṃ hi tasya priyeti // KMdV_82 //
GK19kmeghvpu:108: utsaṅge vā malinavasane somya nikṣipya vīṇāṃ madgotrāṅkaṃ viracitapadaṃ geyam udgātukāmā /
GK19kmeghvpu:109: tantrīr ārdrā nayanasalilaiḥ sārayitvā kathaṃ cid bhūyo bhūyaḥ svayam api kṛtāṃ mūrcchanāṃ vismarantī // KMdV_83 //
GK19kmeghvpu:110: śeṣān māsān gamanadivasaprastutasyāvadher vā vinyasyantī bhuvi gaṇanayā dehalīdattapuṣpaiḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:111: saṃyogaṃ vā hṛdayanihitārambham āsvādayantī prāyeṇaite ramaṇaviraheṣv aṅganānāṃ vinodāḥ // ādye baddhā virahadivase yā śikhā dāma hitvā śāpasyānte vigalitaśucā yā mayonmocanīyā /
GK19kmeghvpu:112_0: sparśakliṣṭām ayamitanakhenāsakṛt sārayantīṃ gaṇḍābhogāt kaṭhinaviṣamād ekaveṇīṃ
GK19kmeghvpu:112_1: kareṇa // savyāpārām ahani na tathā khedayed viprayogaḥ śaṅke rātrau gurutaraśucaṃ
GK19kmeghvpu:113_0: matsaṃdeśaiḥ sukhayitum ataḥ paśya sādhvīṃ niśīthe tām unnidrām avaniśayanāsannavātāyanasthaḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:113_1: ādhikṣāmāṃ virahaśayane saṃnikīrṇaikapārśvāṃ prācīmūle tanum iva kalāmātraśeṣāṃ himāṃśoḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:114_0: matsaṃyogaḥ katham upanamet svapnajo 'pīti nidrām ākāṅkṣantīṃ nayanasalilotpīḍaruddhāvakāśām
GK19kmeghvpu:114_1: niḥśvāsenādharakisalayakleśinā vikṣipantīṃ śuddhasnānāt paruṣamalakaṃ nūnam āgaṇḍalambam /
GK19kmeghvpu:115_0: nītā rātriḥ kṣaṇa iva mayā sārdham icchāratair yā tām evoṣṇair virahaśayaneṣv asrubhir
GK19kmeghvpu:115_1: yāpayantīm pādān indor amṛtaśiśirāñjālamārgapraviṣṭān pūrvaprītyā gatam abhimukhaṃ
GK19kmeghvpu:116: cakṣuḥ khedāt sajalagurubhiḥ pakṣmabhiś chādayantīṃ sābhre 'hnīva
GK19kmeghvpu:117: sthalakamalinīṃ na prabuddhāṃ na suptām // KMdV_89 //
GK19kmeghvpu:118: jāne sakhyās tava mayi manaḥ saṃbhṛtasneham asmād itthaṃbhūtāṃ prathamavirahe tām ahaṃ tarkayāmi
GK19kmeghvpu:119: vācālaṃ māṃ na khalu subhagaṃmanyabhāvaḥ karoti pratyakṣaṃ te nikhilam acirād bhrātar uktaṃ mayā yat // KMdV_90 //
GK19kmeghvpu:120: sā saṃnyastābharaṇam abalā pelavaṃ dhārayantī śayyotsaṅge nihitam asakṛd duḥkhaduḥkhena gātram
GK19kmeghvpu:121_0: tvām apy asraṃ navajalamayaṃ mocayiṣyaty avaśyaṃ prāyaḥ sarvo bhavati karuṇāvṛttir
GK19kmeghvpu:121_1: ārdrāntarātmā ruddhāpāṅgaprasaram alakair añjanasnehaśūnyaṃ pratyādeśād api ca madhuno
GK19kmeghvpu:122: tvayy āsanne nayanam uparispandi śaṅke mṛgākṣyā mīnakṣobhākulakuvalayaśrītulām eṣyatīti // vāmo vāsyāḥ kararuhapadair mucyamāno madīyair muktājālaṃ ciraparicitaṃ tyājito daivagatyā
GK19kmeghvpu:123_0: saṃbhogānte mama samucito hastasaṃvāhanānāṃ yāsyaty ūruḥ sarasakadalīstambhagauraś
GK19kmeghvpu:123_1: calatvam tasmin kāle jalada dayitā labdhanidrā yadi syād anvāsyaināṃ stanitavimukho
GK19kmeghvpu:124_0: mā bhūd asyāḥ praṇayini mayi svapnalabdhe kathaṃ cit sadyaḥ kaṇṭhacyutabhujalatāgranthi
GK19kmeghvpu:124_1: gāḍhopagūḍham tām utthāpya svajalakaṇikāśītalenānilena pratyāśvastāṃ samam abhinavair
GK19kmeghvpu:125_0: vidyudgarbhe nihitanayanāṃ tvatsanāthe gavākṣe vaktuṃ dhīrastanitavacanair māninīṃ
GK19kmeghvpu:125_1: prakramethāḥ bhartur mitraṃ priyam avidhave viddhi mām ambuvāhaṃ tatsaṃdeśān manasi
GK19kmeghvpu:126_0: yo vṛndāni tvarayati pathi śrāmyatāṃ proṣitānāṃ mandrasnigdhair dhvanibhir abalāveṇimokṣotsukāni
GK19kmeghvpu:126_1: ity ākhyāte pavanatanayaṃ maithilīvonmukhī sā tvām utkaṇṭhocchvasitahṛdayā vīkṣya
GK19kmeghvpu:127: śroṣyaty asmāt param avahitā somya sīmantinīnāṃ kāntodantaḥ suhṛdupanataḥ saṃgamāt kiṃ cid ūnaḥ // KMdV_97 //
GK19kmeghvpu:128: tām āyuṣmān mama ca vacanād ātmanā copakartuṃ brūyād evaṃ tava sahacaro rāmagiryāśramasthaḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:129_0: avyāpannaḥ kuśalam abale pṛcchati tvāṃ viyuktaḥ pūrvāśāsyaṃ sulabhavipadāṃ prāṇinām
GK19kmeghvpu:129_1: etad eva aṅgenāṅgaṃ tanu ca tanunā gāḍhataptena taptaṃ sāsreṇāsradravam aviratotkaṇṭham
GK19kmeghvpu:130_0: uṣṇocchvāsaṃ samadhikatarocchvāsinā dūravartī saṃkalpais te viśati vidhinā vairiṇā
GK19kmeghvpu:130_1: ruddhamārgaḥ śabdākhyeyaṃ yad api kila te yaḥ sakhīnāṃ purastāt karṇe lolaḥ kathayitum
GK19kmeghvpu:131: so 'tikrāntaḥ śravaṇaviṣayaṃ locanānām agamyas tvām utkaṇṭhāviracitapadaṃ manmukhenedam āha // KMdV_100 //
GK19kmeghvpu:132: śyāmāsv aṅgaṃ cakitahariṇaprekṣite dṛṣṭipātaṃ gaṇḍacchāyāṃ śaśini śikhināṃ varhabhāreṣu keśān
GK19kmeghvpu:133: utpaśyāmi pratanuṣu nadīvīciṣu bhrūvilāsān hantaikasthaṃ kva cid api na te bhīru sādṛśyam asti // KMdV_101 //
GK19kmeghvpu:134: tvām ālikhya praṇayakupitāṃ dhāturāgaiḥ śilāyām ātmānaṃ te caraṇapatitaṃ yāvad icchāmi kartum
GK19kmeghvpu:135: asrais tāvan muhur upacitair dṛṣṭir ālipyate me krūras tasminn api na sahate saṃgamaṃ nau kṛtāntaḥ // KMdV_102 //
GK19kmeghvpu:136: mām ākāśapraṇihitabhujaṃ nirdayāśleṣahetor labdhāyās te katham api sati svapnasaṃdarśaneṣu
GK19kmeghvpu:137_0: paśyantīnāṃ na khalu bahuśo na sthalīdevatānāṃ muktāsthūlās tarukisalayeṣv asruleśāḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:137_1: patanti bhittvā sadyaḥ kisalayapuṭān devadārudrumāṇāṃ ye tatkṣīrasrutisurabhayo dakṣiṇena
GK19kmeghvpu:138_0: āliṅgyante guṇavati mayā te tuṣārādrivātāḥ pūrvaspṛṣṭaṃ yadi kila bhaved aṅgam ebhis
GK19kmeghvpu:138_1: taveti saṃkṣipyeran kṣaṇa iva kathaṃ dīrghayāmās triyāmāḥ sarvāvasthāsv ahar api
GK19kmeghvpu:139_0: itthaṃ cetaś caṭulanayane durlabhaprārthanaṃ me gāḍhoṣmābhiḥ kṛtam aśaraṇaṃ tvadviyogavyathābhiḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:139_1: nanv ātmānaṃ bahu vigaṇayann ātmanā nāvalambe tat kalyāṇi tvam api sutarāṃ mā gamaḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:140_0: kasyātyantaṃ sukham upanataṃ duḥkham ekāntato vā nīcair gacchaty upari ca daśā cakranemikrameṇa
GK19kmeghvpu:140_1: śāpānto me bhujagaśayanād utthite śārṅgapāṇau māsān anyān gamaya caturo locane mīlayitvā /
GK19kmeghvpu:141_0: paścād āvāṃ virahaguṇitaṃ taṃ tam ātmābhilāṣaṃ nirvekṣyāvaḥ pariṇataśaraccandrikāsu
GK19kmeghvpu:141_1: kṣapāsu bhūyaś cāha tvam api śayane kaṇṭhalagnā purā me nidrāṃ gatvā kim api rudatī
GK19kmeghvpu:142: sāntarhāsaṃ kathitam asakṛt pṛcchataś ca tvayā me dṛṣṭaḥ svapne kitava ramayan kām api tvaṃ mayeti // KMdV_108 //
GK19kmeghvpu:143: etasmān māṃ kuśalinam abhijñānadānād viditvā mā kaulīnād asitanayane mayy aviśvāsinī bhūḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:144_0: snehān āhuḥ kim api virahahrāsinas te hy abhogād iṣṭe vastuny upacitarasāḥ premarāśībhavanti
GK19kmeghvpu:144_1: kac cit somya vyavasitam idaṃ bandhukṛtyaṃ tvayā me pratyākhyātuṃ na khalu bhavato
GK19kmeghvpu:145_0: niḥśabdo 'pi pradiśasi jalaṃ yācitaś cātakebhyaḥ pratyuktaṃ hi praṇayiṣu satām īpsitārthakriyaiva
GK19kmeghvpu:145_1: etat kṛtvā priyam anucitaprārthanāvartmano me sauhārdād vā vidhura iti vā mayy anukrośabuddhyā
